scripts.frontend:release: docker build -t dfcomps-frontend . -f ./build/frontend/frontend.dockerfile && docker save dfcomps-frontend | ssh -C root@dfcomps.ru "docker load && docker stop dfcomps-frontend || true && docker rm dfcomps-frontend || true && docker rmi dfcomps-frontend:release || true && docker image tag dfcomps-frontend:latest dfcomps-frontend:release && docker run -d -p 127.0.0.1:4000:80 --name dfcomps-frontend dfcomps-frontend"
scripts.backend:release: docker build -t dfcomps-backend . -f ./build/backend/backend.dockerfile && docker save dfcomps-backend | ssh -C root@dfcomps.ru "docker load && docker stop dfcomps-backend || true && docker rm dfcomps-backend || true && docker rmi dfcomps-backend:release || true && docker image tag dfcomps-backend:latest dfcomps-backend:release && docker run -d -p 127.0.0.1:4001:4001 --name dfcomps-backend --network dfcomps-network --env-file /usr/local/bin/secrets.env --mount source=dfcomps-files,target=/opt/app/uploads dfcomps-backend"
scripts.database:restore-db: docker exec local_pgdb dropdb --if-exists -f -h localhost -p 5432 -U user dfcomps && docker cp build/database/dev-database.tar local_pgdb:/var/lib/postgresql/dev-database.tar && docker exec local_pgdb createdb -h localhost -p 5432 -U user dfcomps && docker exec local_pgdb pg_restore -U user -d dfcomps /var/lib/postgresql/dev-database.tar
scripts.database:save-db: docker exec local_pgdb pg_dump -U user dfcomps -f /var/lib/postgresql/dev-database.tar -F t && docker cp local_pgdb:/var/lib/postgresql/dev-database.tar build/database/dev-database.tar
scripts.1v1-server:test:ci: concurrently "cross-env LOGS=none npm run 1v1-server:local" "wait-on tcp:4002 && nx test 1v1-server --runInBand"
scripts.1v1-server:stress-test: concurrently "cross-env E2E=true npm run 1v1-server:local" "wait-on tcp:4002 && ts-node --project apps/1v1-server/tsconfig.app.json apps/1v1-server/src/app/1v1/tests/client-stress-testing.ts"
scripts.1v1-server:stress-test:ci: concurrently "cross-env LOGS=none E2E=true npm run 1v1-server:local" "wait-on tcp:4002 && ts-node --project apps/1v1-server/tsconfig.app.json apps/1v1-server/src/app/1v1/tests/client-stress-testing.ts"
scripts.1v1-server:release: docker build -t dfcomps-1v1-server . -f ./build/1v1-server/1v1-server.dockerfile && docker save dfcomps-1v1-server | ssh -C root@dfcomps.ru "docker load && docker stop dfcomps-1v1-server || true && docker rm dfcomps-1v1-server || true && docker rmi dfcomps-1v1-server:release || true && docker image tag dfcomps-1v1-server:latest dfcomps-1v1-server:release && docker run -d -p 127.0.0.1:4002:4002 --name dfcomps-1v1-server --network dfcomps-network --env-file /usr/local/bin/secrets.env dfcomps-1v1-server"
scripts.race:test: concurrently "npm run race:local" "wait-on tcp:4006 && nx test race --runInBand"
scripts.race:release: docker build -t dfcomps-race . -f ./build/race/race.dockerfile && docker save dfcomps-race | ssh -C root@dfcomps.ru "docker load && docker stop dfcomps-race || true && docker rm dfcomps-race || true && docker rmi dfcomps-race:release || true && docker image tag dfcomps-race:latest dfcomps-race:release && docker run -d -p 127.0.0.1:4006:4006 --name dfcomps-race --network dfcomps-network --env-file /usr/local/bin/secrets.env dfcomps-race"
scripts.file-storage:release: docker build -t dfcomps-file-storage . -f ./build/file-storage/file-storage.dockerfile && docker save dfcomps-file-storage | ssh -C root@dfcomps.ru "docker load && docker run -d -p 127.0.0.1:4003:80 --name dfcomps-file-storage --network dfcomps-network --mount source=dfcomps-files,target=/var/www/html dfcomps-file-storage"
scripts.dfcomps:release: npm run frontend:release && npm run backend:release && npm run 1v1-server:release
scripts.e2e: npm run database:restore-db && npx concurrently --raw --kill-others "npm run backend" "wait-on tcp:4001 && nx e2e dfcomps-e2e" && npm run e2e:cleanup || npm run e2e:cleanup
scripts.e2e:single: npm run database:restore-db && npx concurrently --raw --kill-others "npm run backend" "wait-on tcp:4001 && nx e2e dfcomps-e2e --spec=apps/dfcomps-e2e/src/e2e/admin-simple-news.cy.ts" && npm run e2e:cleanup || npm run e2e:cleanup
